about_the_game:
Over five thousand years of Chinese culture has bred poetry and prose, especially in the Tang Dynasty. Feihualing is a game between ancient literati, which has been improved a lot in modern times. With the birth and development of video games in the 20th and 21st century, traditional games have been gradually forgotten. In this new era, the classics should be rewritten in a new way, hence the game.
The game is set in the near future, after the invention of the time machine. You play an ordinary man who one day saves enough money to buy a time machine, and then travels back to the distant past. Then, due to the long journey, the time machine runs out of power, so you open a restaurant in The Tang Dynasty city of Chang 'an to make a living and find materials and tools to make a generator. In order to attract enough guests, there are many preferential activities, "feihualing" is one of them.
In this game, when you pass a level for the first time, the power of the time machine will be increased. When the power of the light machine is increased to 100%, you will complete the game and unlock 2 weeks. The number of levels at the end of each level is not fixed, but the total number of levels is.
You can't go back to the previous level after you pass a level in a week. In 2 weeks, you can play the remaining levels of the previous week, go back and play the previous levels, and play free mode.
Because translate poems to English, it will lose funny, so it only support Chinese. If you are studying Chinese, or interested in it, you can try it.
